subject: [Phase 1] Create workflow-toolkit plugin
description:
Create new workflow-toolkit plugin scaffold:
1. Create `claude/local-marketplace/plugins/workflow-toolkit/.claude-plugin/plugin.json`
2. Move skills from user skills into workflow-toolkit:
   - agent-teams (from claude/skills/agent-teams/)
   - externalise-handover (from claude/skills/externalise-handover/)
   - custom-compact (from claude/skills/custom-compact/)
   - insights (from insights-toolkit plugin - claude/local-marketplace/plugins/insights-toolkit/skills/insights/)
3. Update marketplace.json to register workflow-toolkit
4. Remove insights-toolkit from marketplace.json (absorbed into workflow-toolkit)
